com.sterlingcommerce.woodstock.util.frame.log.base

Interface ISCILogger


  • public interface ISCILogger
    Implement this interface to allow a Logger to delegate tasks.

      • verbose

        void verbose(java.lang.String message)

        Log a VERBOSE level message.

        The verbose method checks if this category is VERBOSE enabled by comparing the level of this category with the VERBOSE level.

        Parameters:
        message - message being logged.

      • info

        void info(java.lang.String message)

        Log a message string with the INFO Level.

        This method first checks if this category is INFO enabled by comparing the level of this category with INFO Level.

        Note: Passing a Throwable to this method will print the name of the Throwable but no stack trace. To print a stack trace use the info(Object, Throwable) form instead.

        Parameters:
        message - The message object to log.

      • warn

        void warn(java.lang.String message)

        Log a message string with the WARN Level.

        This method first checks if this category is WARN enabled by comparing the level of this category with WARN Level.

        Note: Passing a Throwable to this method will print the name of the Throwable but no stack trace. To print a stack trace use the warn(Object, Throwable) form instead.

        Parameters:
        message - The message object to log.

        emessagessage - Message string being logged.

      • error

        Log a Exception as error.
        Parameters:
        ex - Exception being logged.

      • fatal

        void fatal(java.lang.Object message,
           java.lang.Throwable t)

        Logs a message object with a FATAL level including the stack trace of the Throwable t passed as a parameter.

        This method checks to make sure if this category is FATAL enabled by comparing the level of this category with the FATAL level. If this category is FATAL enabled, then it converts the message object to a string by invoking the appropriate object renderer. It then proceeds to call the registered appenders in this category and also higher in the hierarchy depending on the value of the additivity flag.

        Parameters:
        message - Message to be logged.
        t - Exception log, including the stack trace.

      • error

        void error(java.lang.Object message,
           java.lang.Throwable t)

        Logs a message object with ERROR level including the stack trace of the Throwable t passed as parameter.

        This method upon invoking first checks if this category is ERROR enabled by comparing the level of this category with the ERROR level. If this category is error enabled, then it converts the message object passed as parameter to a string by invoking the appropriate object renderer. Then the method proceeds to call all the registered appenders in this category and also higher in the hierarchy depending on the value of the additivity flag.

        Parameters:
        message - The message object to log.
        t - The exception to log including the stack trace.

      • commtrace

        void commtrace(java.lang.String msg)

        Log a COMMTRACE level message.

        The commtrace method checks if this category is COMMTRACE enabled by comparing the level of this category with the COMMTRACE level.

        Parameters:
        msg - message being logged.
